meanings.definition: Stay in one place in anticipation of something.
meanings.sent1: The cat waits by the door for its owner to come home.
meanings.sent2: She waits patiently for the bus to arrive every morning.
meanings.sent3: The little girl waits eagerly for her birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Time waits for no one, so make the most of every moment.
meanings.sent5: The student waits anxiously for the test results.

meanings.definition: Pass time in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: He waits by playing video games when he's bored.
meanings.sent2: They wait by reading books during the long car ride.
meanings.sent3: The family waits by having a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: She waits by painting beautiful landscapes on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The friends wait by exploring new hiking trails together.

meanings.definition: Serve customers in a restaurant or bar.
meanings.sent1: The waiter waits on the table with a friendly smile.
meanings.sent2: She waits on customers efficiently during the busy lunch rush.
meanings.sent3: The bartender waits on the regulars with their favorite drinks.
meanings.sent4: He waits on the guests with professionalism and courtesy.
meanings.sent5: The waitress waits on the family with excellent service.

meanings.sent1: The long waits at the doctor's office can be frustrating.
meanings.sent2: She experienced a series of short waits at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected waits in line made him late for the movie.
meanings.sent4: The endless waits for the train tested her patience.
meanings.sent5: The brief waits for the elevator seemed like forever.
